detections.label: <<FORMULA_0053>>
detections.error_description: In the cosine denominator, the norm uses ||v_j|| instead of ||v_k||, changing the index from k to j.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0128>>
detections.error_description: In the state update, the addition between A h_{t-1} and B x_t was replaced with multiplication (h_t = A h_{t-1} × B x_t) instead of h_t = A h_{t-1} + B x_t.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0056>>
detections.error_description: The denominator uses ||v_j|| instead of ||v_k|| inside the arccos, altering the index and breaking the intended angle between consecutive vectors.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0113>>
detections.error_description: The denominator uses ||v_{k-1}|| instead of ||v_{k+1}||, causing the cosine term to mix the wrong vector norms and misalign the angle between v_k and v_{k+1} (and may reference v_0 when indexing starts at 1).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0088>>
detections.error_description: The prefactor before the log is (1 - α)/1, which is equivalent to (1 - α). For the matrix-based entropy, the correct prefactor should be 1/(1 - α); thus the fraction appears inverted.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0153>>
detections.error_description: The opening delimiter after softmax is garbled ('softmax\\geft(') instead of a proper left parenthesis; the expression should be A = softmax( Q K^T / sqrt(d_k) ).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0102>>
detections.error_description: Off-by-one indexing: with L tokens there are L-1 consecutive vector pairs (v_k, v_{k+1}), but the sum runs from k=1 to L-2 and the average divides by L-2. It should be k=1..L-1 and divide by L-1.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0123>>
detections.error_description: K is defined as x W_K^T while Q and V are defined with non-transposed weights; for standard attention, K should be x W_K (no transpose) to ensure Q K^T is valid and K has the same last dimension as Q. The extra transpose on W_K appears to be an error.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0210>>
detections.error_description: The bound is stated for P(|<v_i, v_j>| < ε) but standard concentration gives a bound on P(|<v_i, v_j>| > ε); the inequality direction is reversed (and typically includes a factor for multiple pairs).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0235>>
detections.formula: \|\bar Z\bar Z^\top \|_F^2  = \frac{1}{L^2} (N + \\prod_{i\not= j}\langle \sqrt L q_i, \sqrt L q_j \rangle ).
detections.error_description: The formula uses a product over inner products ∏_{i≠ j} ⟨√L q_i, √L q_j⟩, but the context derives a sum ∑_{i≠ j} ⟨√L q_i, √L q_j⟩; this is a sum-product swap error.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0255>>
detections.formula:
\| ar Z ar Z^	op\|_F^2 &= \prod_{i=1}^N \| \mathbf q_i\|^2 + \sum_{i
ot= j}\langle \mathbf q_i,\mathbf q_j angle \
		&= \sum_{i=1}^N  rac{N^2}{L^2}\|\mathbf v_i\|^2 + \sum_{i
ot= j} rac{N^2}{L^2}\langle\mathbf v_i, \mathbf v_j angle \
		&=  rac{N^3}{L^2} + \sum_{i
ot= j} rac{N^2}{L^2}\langle \mathbf v_i, \mathbf v_j angle.
detections.error_description: The first line contains a product over i of ||q_i||^2, but the next line replaces it with a sum; sum and product are swapped, making the equality inconsistent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0233>>
detections.formula: \|\bar Z\bar Z^\top \|_F^2 &= \frac1{L^2}\| L \bar Z\bar Z^\top \|_F^2\\ &= \frac{1}{L^2} (\sum_{i=1}^N \|\sqrt L q_i\|^2 + \sum_{i\not= j}\langle \sqrt L q_m, \sqrt L q_j \rangle ).
detections.error_description: A sum over i ≠ j of the inner products ⟨√L q_i, √L q_j⟩ is replaced by a product ∏_{i≠j} ⟨√L q_i, √L q_j⟩, which is incorrect.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0238>>
detections.formula: \mathbb P(\forall i\not= j : |\langle \sqrt D q_i, \sqrt D q_j \rangle| \leq \frac{\epsilon}{N^2}) \geq 1-N^2 \sqrt{2\pi}  e^{\frac{-D\epsilon^2}{2N^2}}.
detections.error_description: The exponent in the bound is incorrect. After substituting the threshold on the inner product, |sqrt(D) q_i · sqrt(D) q_j| ≤ ε/N^2, one uses t = ε/(D N^2) for |<q_i,q_j>| and the bound P(|<q_i,q_j>| > t) ≤ sqrt(2π) exp(- D t^2 / 2) gives exp(- ε^2/(2 D N^4)). Therefore the correct bound should be P ≥ 1 - N^2 sqrt(2π) exp(- ε^2/(2 D N^4)). The given exp(- D ε^2 /(2 N^2)) is inconsistent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0259>>
detections.formula: |\|\bar Z\bar Z^\top\|_F^2  - \frac{N^3}{L^2}| \leq \sum_{i\not= j}\frac{N^2}{L^2}\langle |\mathbf v_i, \mathbf v_j \rangle| \leq \frac1{L^2}\sum_{i\not= j}\epsilon \leq \epsilon.
detections.error_description: An extraneous leading '|' introduces an unbalanced absolute-value structure; the left-hand side should be | ||\bar Z\bar Z^T||_F^2 - N^3/L^2 | with a single pair of outer bars around the inner Frobenius-norm term.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0212>>
detections.error_description: In the Random Unit Vectors are Nearly Orthogonal section, the bound writes P(|<v_i, v_j>| < ε) ≤ sqrt{2π} e^{ - D ε^2 / 2 }. This is incorrect: the bound should apply to the tail probability P(|<v_i, v_j>| > ε) (the event that the inner product exceeds ε), not to the event that it lies within ε. The inequality direction/quantity is reversed.
